item.title: [PI] Need help with a quick fix thanks <3
item.dc:creator: @dun_dun_dun dun dun dun
item.description:
@dun_dun_dun wrote:

I have one for a PI source.

if(playerCommand.startsWith("forums") && c.playerRights >= 0) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("www.yoursitehere.com", 12000); }

Then you might need to add this in your commands.java too,

if(playerCommand.startsWith("www")) { c.getPA().sendFrame126(playerCommand,0); }

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Need help with a quick fix thanks <3
